Player History
Injured on 5/19/1966 with a Sore Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Was selected to the 1968 Allstar game...
Traded from Cincinnati to Texas on 5/21/1969 (Going to CIN: LF T. Agee, P T. Metcalf, P G. Bell. Going to TEX: 2B B. Mazeroski, SS C. Tovar)...
Was selected to the 1970 Allstar game...
Had 21-game hitting streak snapped on 6/27/1971...
Was selected to the 1971 Allstar game...
Won World Series with Texas in 1972...
Injured on 10/2/1975 with a Pulled Tricep Muscle, out for 5 weeks...
Injured on 7/28/1976 with a Broken Wrist, out for full season...
